titleStmt.title: An elegy in commemoration of Sr. Edmund Saunders, late lord chief justice of H[i]s Majesties Court of Kings-Bench; vvho departed this life the 19th of this instant June, anno Domini, 1683.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "And art thou gon, thou brave amongst the great ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
